column4: hello all, i can't seem to get sound from my headphone port.  the laptop speakers do turn off when i plug in the headphones.
Is there a separate setting in your volume control for headphone volume, perhaps?
i'm not entirely sure what all the options i have actually mean.  nothing stood out as obvious to me.
Ah. Thought I'd check, since I originally had a problem with that on my laptop. Didn't realize I had to set my headphone volume independently.
